subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. Europe, Kazakhstan , Siberia, Russian Far East ( Caldara 2013a ).

Biology. Floodplain forests. Adults occur in III–VII ( Dieckmann 1986 ). On Salicaceae :
Populus nigra
( Hoffmann 1958 ; Smreczyński 1972 ; Dieckmann 1986 );
P. balsamifera
,
P. tremula ( Dieckmann 1986 )
.
